caption.p: Effects of Centella asiatica leaf extract (CAE) against Helicobacter pylori colonization in C57BL/6 mice. CAE was administered orally at 50 and 250 mg/kg, once daily for three weeks. The results are expressed as mean Â± SEM ( n = 10). * p < 0.05 compared with the control. Figure and caption reused from Zheng et al. [ 82].
